alert.note: Alert for Jones (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 5:14PM EST until February 04 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Falling Creek near East Juliette affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Falling Creek near East Juliette. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and natural flood plain along the creek in the Piedmont National Wildlife Refuge upstream and downstream from the gage on Round Oak-Juliette Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The creek is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling through late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
